Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.model

Class PersonalBoard

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.common.utils.observe.MessageObservable
it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.PersonalBoard
public class PersonalBoard
extends MessageObservable
This class is the personal board of a player, it is used to from the player to perform any action. The personal board coordinates every element of the game that is owned by the player

  • Method Details

    • setDemo

      public void setDemo()
      Method used to set starting resources and cards for the player in a demo game

    • activateCardProduction

      public void activateCardProduction​(java.util.Map<Resource,​java.lang.Integer> costStrongbox, java.util.Map<Resource,​java.lang.Integer> costWarehouseDepot, int indexDevelopmentCardSpace) throws InvalidProductionException, InvalidRemovalException, InvalidCostException, InvalidParameterException
      Method used to activate the production using the power of production of a development card
      Parameters:
      costStrongbox - The cost of power of production paid with the resources located in the strongbox
      costWarehouseDepot - The cost of power of production paid with the resources located in the warehouse
      indexDevelopmentCardSpace - The number of the development card slot used for the production. Ranges from 1 to 3
      Throws:
      InvalidProductionException - If the same production has already been done in the same turn
      InvalidRemovalException - If the payment can't be made
      InvalidCostException - If the specified costs do not match the cost required by the power of production
      InvalidParameterException

    • activateBasicProduction

      public void activateBasicProduction​(java.util.Map<Resource,​java.lang.Integer> costStrongbox, java.util.Map<Resource,​java.lang.Integer> costWarehouseDepot, Resource resource) throws InvalidProductionException, InvalidRemovalException, InvalidCostException
      Method used to activate the production using the basic production power
      Parameters:
      costStrongbox - The cost of power of production paid with the resources located in the strongbox
      costWarehouseDepot - The cost of power of production paid with the resources located in the warehouse
      resource - The resource that is going to be produced
      Throws:
      InvalidProductionException - If the same production has already been done in the same turn or if the specified resource is faith
      InvalidRemovalException - If the payment can't be made
      InvalidCostException - If the total resources are not two

    • activateLeaderProduction

      public void activateLeaderProduction​(java.util.Map<Resource,​java.lang.Integer> costStrongbox, java.util.Map<Resource,​java.lang.Integer> costWarehouseDepot, int numLeaderCard, Resource resource) throws InvalidProductionException, InvalidRemovalException, InvalidLeaderAction, InvalidCostException
      Method used to activate the production using the power of production of a leader card with the proper power
      Parameters:
      costStrongbox - The cost of power of production paid with the resources located in the strongbox
      costWarehouseDepot - The cost of power of production paid with the resources located in the warehouse
      numLeaderCard - The number of the leader card to use, must be strictly greater than 0 and strictly less than leader cards not discarded in PlayerBoard
      resource - The resource that is going to be produced (together with a faith point already provided by the leader card)
      Throws:
      InvalidProductionException - If the specified leader card does not exist or if the same production has already been done in the same turn
      InvalidRemovalException - If the payment can't be made
      InvalidLeaderAction - If the chosen leader card does not have the proper power
      InvalidCostException - If the specified costs do not match the cost required by the power of production

    • takeFromMarket

      public void takeFromMarket​(int rowOrColumn, int value) throws InvalidParameterException
      Method used to acquire marbles form market
      Parameters:
      rowOrColumn - 0 if row, 1 if column
      value - from 0 to 2 if row, from 0 to 3 if column Todo ricontrollare
      Throws:
      InvalidParameterException

    • transformWhiteMarble

      public void transformWhiteMarble​(int leaderCard, int numOfTransformations) throws InvalidParameterException, NotEnoughWhiteMarblesException, InvalidLeaderAction
      This method transform a number of white marbles in the temporaryMarbles map
      Parameters:
      leaderCard - is the number of the card to use to transform marbles
      numOfTransformations - is the number of marbles that needs to be transformed
      Throws:
      NotEnoughWhiteMarblesException - this exception is thrown when there are not enough white marbles in the given map of marbles
      InvalidParameterException - if the provided parameters contain not admitted values
      InvalidLeaderAction - this exception is thrown when the selected leader does not have a suitable power

    • transformMarbles

      public void transformMarbles()
      Method used to transform marbles taken from market into resources stored in temporary map resources

    • addToWarehouseDepots

      public void addToWarehouseDepots​(int depotLevel, java.util.Map<Resource,​java.lang.Integer> singleResourceMap) throws InvalidAdditionException
      Method used to add a single resource type in a specified quantity from the temporary resource map to a depot
      Parameters:
      depotLevel - The depot to add the resource to
      singleResourceMap - The map which contains the single resource type and its quantity
      Throws:
      InvalidAdditionException - If there is not a single resource type, if the resource is not in the temporary resource map or is not enough, or if the rules of the warehouse depot are not followed

    • discardResourcesFromMarket

      public void discardResourcesFromMarket()
      This method empties the temporary resources of the player and gives a faith point for each resource discarded to every other player

    • swapResourceStandardDepot

      public void swapResourceStandardDepot​(int depot1, int depot2) throws InvalidSwapException
      Method used to swap resources between two standard depots
      Parameters:
      depot1 - Cannot be a special depot
      depot2 - Cannot be a special depot
      Throws:
      InvalidSwapException - This exception is thrown when the depot is a special depot or when the resource of at least one depot do not fit the other depot

    • moveResourceSpecialDepot

      public void moveResourceSpecialDepot​(int sourceDepotNumber, int destinationDepotNumber, int quantity) throws InvalidAdditionException, InvalidRemovalException, InvalidMoveException
      Method to move a resource between a standard depot and a special depot, only one of the two depots can be a special depot
      Parameters:
      sourceDepotNumber - Number of the depot from which the resource has to be moved, if this is a special depot the other depot cannot be a special depot
      destinationDepotNumber - Number of the depot to which the resource has to be moved, if this is a special depot the other depot cannot be a special depot
      quantity - How much of the resource in the source depot has to be moved
      Throws:
      InvalidRemovalException - If there is not enough of the resource in the source depot
      InvalidAdditionException - If the resource cannot be moved to the destination depot
      InvalidMoveException - If the condition that only one of the two depots can be a special depot is not respected or if at least one of the two depots does not exist

    • buyDevelopmentCard

      public void buyDevelopmentCard​(int row, int column, java.util.Map<Resource,​java.lang.Integer> costStrongbox, java.util.Map<Resource,​java.lang.Integer> costWarehouseDepots, int numLeaderCard, int cardPosition) throws NoCardException, InvalidCostException, InvalidLeaderAction, InvalidRemovalException, InvalidDevelopmentCardException, InvalidParameterException
      Method to buy a development card from card grid
      Parameters:
      row - Row of the card grid of the chosen card, ranges from 1 to 3
      column - Column of the card grid of the chosen card, ranges from 1 to 4
      costStrongbox - The cost of power of production paid with the resources located in the strongbox
      costWarehouseDepots - The cost of power of production paid with the resources located in the warehouse
      numLeaderCard - The number of the leader card to use to discount the price, if 0 then no leader card will be used, otherwise must be greater than 0 and strictly less than leader cards not discarded in PlayerBoard
      cardPosition - The development card space slot in which the bought card will be placed
      Throws:
      NoCardException - If there is no card in the specified coordinates of card grid
      InvalidCostException - If the specified price does not match the one of the chosen card
      InvalidLeaderAction - If the specified leader card does not have the proper power
      InvalidRemovalException - If the payment can't be made
      InvalidDevelopmentCardException - If the card cannot be placed in the chosen development card space slot
      InvalidParameterException - If the specified development card space slot does not exist

    • activateLeader

      public void activateLeader​(int numLeaderCard) throws RequirementNotMetException, InvalidParameterException
      Method to activate a leader
      Parameters:
      numLeaderCard - The number of the leader card to activate, must be greater than 0 and strictly less than leader cards not discarded in PlayerBoard
      Throws:
      RequirementNotMetException - if the requirements of the leader card are not met
      InvalidParameterException - if the specified numLeaderCard is not correct, or if the leader card is already active

    • removeLeader

      public void removeLeader​(int numLeaderCard) throws InvalidParameterException
      Method used to discard a leader card during the game and gain a faith point as a consequence
      Parameters:
      numLeaderCard - The number of the leader card to activate, must be greater than 0 and strictly less than leader cards not discarded in PlayerBoard
      Throws:
      InvalidParameterException - if numLeaderCard is incorrect or the leader does not exist

    • discardInitialLeader

      public void discardInitialLeader​(int indexLeaderCard1, int indexLeaderCard2) throws InvalidParameterException
      Method used to discard the two leader cards at the beginning of the match
      Parameters:
      indexLeaderCard1 - Index of one of the two leader cards to discard, must range from 1 to 4 and must be different from the other index
      indexLeaderCard2 - Index of one of the two leader cards to discard, must range from 1 to 4 and must be different from the other index
      Throws:
      InvalidParameterException - If the conditions specified in the parameters are not met

    • addInitialResources

      public void addInitialResources​(java.util.Map<Resource,​java.lang.Integer> initialResources) throws InvalidParameterException
      Method used to add initial resources chosen by player according to its order
      Parameters:
      initialResources - Resources to add to the temporary resources
      Throws:
      InvalidParameterException - If the number of resources chosen doesn't match the possible number of resources the player can choose

      public void endProduction()

      public void checkVaticanReport()

      Parameters:
